job_description:
We are looking for a hands-on Tech / Business leader to join our founding team. This person will be responsible for optimizing our digital presence and bringing to life the first version of our B2C platform. This is a chance to work with a smart, driven, founding team that is in the process of creating a game changing wellness education/marketplace platform from ground zero. You will get to wear multiple hats, and be direct in line for a CTO position.

Role Responsibilities
Own Technical product vision and implementation end-to-end
Design, build, and maintain WebApp, Apple/Android App, Microservices, Database
Work with Founders, designers & your chosen team to translate designs and business requirements into software product
Build software systems to scale millions of transaction per day with low-latency, high-availability
Lead Project Management for technical product development
Determine process improvements, best practices, and develop new processes.
Technical Skills
Prior experience working with AWS/Cloud technologies
Proficiency with HTML/CSS, React, JavaScript and jQuery, database technologies
Good understanding of server-side CSS, node.js, Python
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Relentless Customer Obsession
Role Model leadership
Compensation: We are in the middle of a seed funding round and will be able to offer equity + a living wage in the early months, with plans to offer a competitive salary in the winter of 2021
